markdownRemark.html: This beach is a mix of gritty sand and shingle and not really suitable for swimmers. This is one of the best beaches in Andalusia for dogs though! This beach has portable water fountains, a doggy playpark, a dog potty area and much more.

frontmatter.title: Canine Beach Torre del Mar
frontmatter.description: Canine Beach Torre del Mar - This beach is a mix of gritty sand and shingle and not really suitable for swimmers. This is one of the best beaches in Andalusia for dogs though! This beach has portable water fountains, a doggy playpark, a dog potty area and much more.
